languages.text: {n}Кассия смотрит со смесью нежности и тоски, пока вязкое алое пятно расползается под ее хрупким телом. Когтистой ладонью она осторожно касается вашей щеки и хрипло произносит:{/n} "Спа-сибо, {name}. Что сделали это для меня. Я..." {n}Алая кровь тонкой струйкой вырывается из ее горла вместе с кашлем.{/n} "Вы были первым, кого я полюбила в этом мире, а ведь я даже не могла полюбить себя. Прошу вас, живите! Живите..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия смотрит со смесью нежности и тоски, пока вязкое алое пятно расползается под ее хрупким телом. Когтистой ладонью она осторожно касается вашей щеки и хрипло произносит:{/n} "Спа-сибо, {name}. Что сделали это для меня. Я..." {n}Алая кровь тонкой струйкой вырывается из ее горла вместе с кашлем.{/n} "Вы были первым, кого я полюбила в этом мире, а ведь я даже не могла полюбить себя. Прошу вас, живите! Живите..."

languages.text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

languages.text: {n}カシアは愛情と悲しみが混じり合う中、自分の体の下にネットリとした深紅の水たまりができるのを見守っている。尖った爪のある手をあなたの頬にゆっくりと這わせながら言った。{/n}「ありが…とう、{name}。感謝しています。私は…」{n}咳とともに喉からツーッと血が流れる。.{/n}「あなたは、自分のことですら愛することができなかった私がこの世で最初に愛した人です。だからお願いです。生きて！生きてください…」
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは愛情と悲しみが混じり合う中、自分の体の下にネットリとした深紅の水たまりができるのを見守っている。尖った爪のある手をあなたの頬にゆっくりと這わせながら言った。{/n}「ありが…とう、{name}。感謝しています。私は…」{n}咳とともに喉からツーッと血が流れる。.{/n}「あなたは、自分のことですら愛することができなかった私がこの世で最初に愛した人です。だからお願いです。生きて！生きてください…」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅的眼神中带着悲伤与温柔，看着粘稠的深红色液体渐渐在她身下变成了一汪水潭。她伸出了带着利爪的手，小心翼翼地抚摸你的脸颊。{/n}“谢谢……你，{name}。谢谢你为我做的一切。我……”{n}她咳嗽起来，细细的血流顺着她的喉咙流了下来。{/n}“尽管我连自己都不爱，但在这个世界上，你是我第一个爱上的人。所以，你要好好地活下去！活下……”
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅的眼神中带着悲伤与温柔，看着粘稠的深红色液体渐渐在她身下变成了一汪水潭。她伸出了带着利爪的手，小心翼翼地抚摸你的脸颊。{/n}“谢谢……你，{name}。谢谢你为我做的一切。我……”{n}她咳嗽起来，细细的血流顺着她的喉咙流了下来。{/n}“尽管我连自己都不爱，但在这个世界上，你是我第一个爱上的人。所以，你要好好地活下去！活下……”

languages.text: {n}Con una mezcla de ternura y tristeza, Cassia observa el viscoso charco carmesí extenderse bajo su cuerpo. Roza con cuidado tu mejilla con una garra y susurra:{/n} «Gracias... {name}. Por hacer esto por mí. Eres...» {n}Un hilillo de sangre escapa de su garganta junto con una tos.{/n} «Eres la primera persona a la que he llegado a amar en esta vida, aun siendo incapaz de amarme a mí misma. Así que, por favor, ¡vive! Vive...».
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

Eres...» {n}Un hilillo de sangre escapa de su garganta junto con una tos.{/n} «Eres la primera persona a la que he llegado a amar en esta vida, aun siendo incapaz de amarme a mí misma. Así que, por favor, ¡vive! Vive...».

languages.text: {n}Mit einer Mischung aus Zärtlichkeit und Traurigkeit sieht Cassia zu, wie sich unter ihrem Körper eine zähflüssige rote Lache bildet. Ihre Klauenhände streichen zart über deine Wange und sie keucht:{/n} "Danke ... {name}. Dass Ihr das für mich getan habt. Ich ..." {n}Ein dünnes Blutrinnsal tritt mit einem Husten aus ihrer Kehle.{/n} "Ihr wart die erste Seele, die ich in dieser Welt geliebt habe, obwohl ich mich nicht einmal selbst lieben konnte. Also lebt bitte! Lebt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

Ihre Klauenhände streichen zart über deine Wange und sie keucht:{/n} "Danke ... {name}. Dass Ihr das für mich getan habt. Ich ..." {n}Ein dünnes Blutrinnsal tritt mit einem Husten aus ihrer Kehle.{/n} "Ihr wart die erste Seele, die ich in dieser Welt geliebt habe, obwohl ich mich nicht einmal selbst lieben konnte. Also lebt bitte! Lebt ..."

languages.text: {n}Avec une tendresse mêlée de mélancolie, Cassia baisse les yeux sur la flaque de liquide visqueux qui s'étend lentement sous son corps. Sa main vient caresser délicatement votre joue.{/n} « Merci, {name}, {n}dit-elle d'une voix rauque.{/n} Merci de faire ça pour moi. Je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt pour tousser, et du sang se met à couler de la commissure de ses lèvres jusque dans son cou.{/n} « Même si je n'ai pas su m'aimer moi-même, vous avez été mon premier et unique amour dans cet univers. Alors, je vous en conjure, vivez ! Vivez... »
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une tendresse mêlée de mélancolie, Cassia baisse les yeux sur la flaque de liquide visqueux qui s'étend lentement sous son corps. Sa main vient caresser délicatement votre joue.{/n} « Merci, {name}, » {n}dit-elle d'une voix rauque.{/n} « Merci de faire ça pour moi. Je... » {n}Elle s'interrompt pour tousser, et du sang se met à couler de la commissure de ses lèvres jusque dans son cou.{/n} « Même si je n'ai pas su m'aimer moi-même, vous avez été mon premier et unique amour dans cet univers. Alors, je vous en conjure, vivez ! Vivez... »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, vücudunun altında oluşan kan gölünü izlerken gözlerinden şefkat ve hüzün okunuyor. Pençeli eliyle özenle yanağını okşarken sesi de kulak tırmalıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {name}... Benim için bunu yaptın, teşekkür ederim. Sen..." {n}Öksürünce Cassia'nın ağzından ince bir çizgi hâlinde kan akıyor.{/n} "Kendimi bile sevemezken bu dünyada sevdiğim ilk kişi sen oldun. Yalvarırım hayata tutun! Hayatını yaşa..."
languages.original_text: {n}With a mix of tenderness and sadness, Cassia watches as a viscous crimson puddle grows beneath her body. Her clawed hand brushes carefully against your cheek and she rasps,{/n} "Thank... you, {name}. For doing this for me. I..." {n}A thin stream of blood escapes from her throat along with a cough.{/n} "You were the first soul I came to love in this world, even though I could not even love myself. So, please, live! Live..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia vücudunun altında oluşan kan gölünü izlerken gözlerinden şefkat ve hüzün okunuyor. Pençeli eliyle dikkatle yanağını okşarken kulak tırmalayan bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim {name}... Benim için bunu yaptığın için teşekkür ederim. Sen..." {n}Öksürünce Cassia'nın ağzından ince bir çizgi hâlinde kan akıyor.{/n} "Kendimi bile sevemezken bu dünyada sevdiğim ilk kişi sen oldun. O yüzden hayata tutun lütfen! Hayatını yaşa..."
